segments.text: I see a detailed line drawing of an indoor kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The perspective is slightly angled, showing a sink and counters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Daylight streams in through the open window above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, a calm garden with a path and bushes is visible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink, surprisingly, is overflowing with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A continuous sheet of water pours over the front edge onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman stands at the sink, drying a plate, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already in the growing puddle of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Further left, a boy is on a wobbly two-step stool, reaching into a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate, perhaps to catch the cookies or as a lid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands nearby, hand raised, waiting for a cookie from him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is full of small, unfolding dramas that the main adult misses.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a complex tableau of domestic life and hidden mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm just observing all these details, quite fascinated.
segments.speaker: PAR
